meanings.definition: Relating to or suffering from apnea.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the apneic patient with a sleep disorder.
meanings.sent2: She felt apneic during the night, waking up gasping for air.
meanings.sent3: The apneic puppy snored louder than a grown dog.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the room was so apneic, it felt suffocating.
meanings.sent5: The apneic pause in his speech made everyone hold their breath.

meanings.definition: Characterized by temporary cessation of breathing.
meanings.sent1: The apneic baby's mother rushed to his crib in panic.
meanings.sent2: The swimmer experienced an apneic episode while holding his breath underwater.
meanings.sent3: The apneic fish seemed to be playing a game of 'who can hold their breath the longest'.
meanings.sent4: The apneic moment before the storm hit was eerie and unsettling.
meanings.sent5: The apneic stillness of the forest at night was broken only by the rustling of leaves.
